department.en: Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering

goal.en:
“1. Familiar with neural networks, fuzzy systems, optimization algorithms, and swarm intelligence
2. Be able to use programming languages to implement some popular neural networks
3. Be able to give a presentation
“
goal.ch:
“1. 了解類神經網路、模糊系統、最佳化演算法和群體智慧。
2. 能使用程式語言實現類神經網路演算法。
3. 有能力做簡報。
“

content.en:
“Neural Networks
Fuzzy Systems
Evolutionary Computation
Genetic Algorithm
Swarm Intelligence “
content.ch:
“類神經網路簡介
模糊系統
演化式計算
基因演算法
群體智慧
“

textbook.en:
“Neural Networks: a comprehensive foundation by Simon Haykin, 1999
Neural-Fuzzy and Soft Computing by J. –S. Jang, C. –T. Sun, and E. Mizutani, Prentice-Hall, 1997
Swarm Intelligence: From Natural to Artificial Systems , by E. Bonaheau, M. Dorigo, and G. Theraulaz, 1999
Genetic Algorithms in Search, Optimization, and Machine Learning by D. E. Goldberg, 1989
蘇木春、張孝德, 機器學習：類神經網路、模糊系統以及基因演算法, 1999
“
textbook.ch:
“Neural Networks: a comprehensive foundation by Simon Haykin, 1999
Neural-Fuzzy and Soft Computing by J. –S. Jang, C. –T. Sun, and E. Mizutani, Prentice-Hall, 1997
Swarm Intelligence: From Natural to Artificial Systems , by E. Bonaheau, M. Dorigo, and G. Theraulaz, 1999
Genetic Algorithms in Search, Optimization, and Machine Learning by D. E. Goldberg, 1989
蘇木春、張孝德, 機器學習：類神經網路、模糊系統以及基因演算法, 1999
“

grading.en:
“One Exam: 30％
Homework: 40％
Presentation: 30％
since 4/29 Questions: 3 times (required)
“

ch.competency: 發掘、分析及處理問題的能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗
紙筆測驗/會考 ， 作業練習 ， 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 創新及獨立思考之能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 溝通協調與團隊合作能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 實作/實驗

ch.competency: 洞察資訊技術潮流與國際趨勢
專案規畫與管理之能力
終身學習與自我成長之能力
ch.Assessments: 口頭報告/口試 ， 出席/課堂表現

en: Department:MSc in Computer Science and Information Engineering、Institute of Software Engineering、Master‘s Program in Artificial Intelligence, Department of Computer Science and Information Engineering、PhD in Computer Science and Information Engineering only.
Department:Department of Computer Science and Elec. Engineering only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
Department:Specialty Program-Big Data Analysis、Specialty Program-Artificial Intelligence and Information Security only.
Department:Interdisciplinary Program of Electrical Engineering and Computer Science only.Year:Third Year、Fourth Year only.
ch: 系所:限資訊工程學系碩士班、資訊工程學系軟體工程碩士班、資訊工程學系AI碩士班、資訊工程學系博士班。
系所:限資訊工程學系。年級:限三年級、四年級。
系所:限學分學程-巨量資料分析、學分學程-人工智慧與資訊安全。
系所:限資訊電機學院學士班。年級:限三年級、四年級。
